attributes.action: to Make NHS Dental Health Treatment accessible to all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dental treatment is Primary Health Care not a luxury. When I was a child, free dental care was available to all irrespective of financial status. Nowadays, for reasons that escape me, it is often private with NHS treatment difficult to obtain. This means that millions of UK citizens are not receiving any form of dental care. This is totally unacceptable.
